entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Refactor primary view selection so we have the same code path for nav bars and document outline #66448
  • Cannot create nuint to UInt32 conversion in custom CoreLib #66442
  • Visual Studio 2022 makes double quote escaped when pasting copied text #66441

Closed

  • The `SyntaxGenerator` class omits `this` and `params` keyword for extension methods #65835
  • The `SyntaxGenerator` does not generate implicit conversion operators #65833
  • Document.GetOptionsAsync returns wrong TabSize for VB document #66325
    17.6
  • Incorrect Solution snapshot used for diagnostic analysis #48351
    Backlog
  • Implicitly typed lambdas with `[UnscopedRef]` don't match their own anonymous delegate types #63565
    17.6
  • Date format IntelliSense popup uses local format for en-us #60729
    17.6
  • Provide separate `yield return` and `yield break` completions instead of a single `yield` #65390
  • VS incorrectly report a build as succeeded when a Roslyn code generator warning CS8785 treated as error fails the build #65313
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate that all options are successfully read from VS settings. #66447
    Area-IDE
  • Support emitting type-parameter variance in syntax generator #66446
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for generating ref-members in SyntaxGenerator #66445
    Area-IDE
  • Enable EnC file logging during VS Feedback recording and collect the logs #66443
    Area-Interactive
  • Preserve changes that are still relevant after revert of #66311 #66440
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix `this` and `params` modifiers generation #66390
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Initial syntax types for collection literals #66412
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66404
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Support generating conversion-operators from SyntaxGenerator #66444
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix reading VB editor options from ISettingsManager (main) #66399
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Catch exceptions when doing I/O to read the generator file version #66422
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix DateTime item's description in different culture #66420
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Replace placeholder XXX SDK version #66437
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Apply diagnostic filter to generator failure warnings #66263
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66449
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Ensure no extension method applies to System.Void #66416
    Area-Compilers
  • Optimize StringBuilder calculations for netcoreapp3.1 and newer #66156
    Area-Compilers
  • Initial support for collection literal parsing. #66417
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review
  • Move all Document Outline update operations to background thread #65641
    Area-IDE
  • Allow missing CommandLineArgsForDesignTimeEvaluation msbuild property #66367
    Area-IDE
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE
  • Fix mismatched per-language option storages #66421
    Area-IDE
  • Remove CS1701 and CS1702 warnings #66313
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Visit unreachable `when` clauses by `NullableWalker` #66405
  • Create a README for CLaSP #66083
    Area-IDE
  • Let LSP client know which diagnostics are build-only. #66329
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2088372 #66423
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE
  • Emit copy when calling non-readonly method with ref readonly field receiver #66351
    Area-Compilers
  • Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references #66430
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit query lambda by `NullableWalker` even without conversion #66384
    Area-Compilers
